body: When I first get on and my hands are freezing I can't click or aim very well. I hate having to play for 20 - 30 minutes before I can actually PvP at my best. Does anyone know a trick or something so I can play at my best straight away?
body_tagged: When I first get on and my hands are freezing I can't click or aim very well. I hate having to play for 20 - 30 minutes before I can actually PvP at my best. Does anyone know a trick or something so I can play at my best straight away?
title: Warming up

replies.body:
Desktops: Open it up and rip out the CPU fan. You now have a heater
Laptops: Microwave it for 99 minutes. Once the microwave has exploded take out the remains of the laptop and use it as heater.

Seriously: Read above
